trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the component associated with this attribute has been inherited from a base class.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否已从基类继承与此属性关联的组件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
InheritanceAttribute represents the type and level of inheritance of a member.
trans-unit.target: InheritanceAttribute 表示的类型和成员继承的级别。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService> searches the component fields of a component to identify fields that are inherited from a base class, the method represents the inheritance level of each component using an InheritanceAttribute.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService>搜索要标识继承自基类，该方法的字段的组件的组件字段表示使用 InheritanceAttribute 每个组件的继承级别。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> class with the specified inheritance level.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>指定的继承级别的类。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"></xref> that indicates the level of inheritance to set this attribute to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"> </xref>指示继承，以将此属性设置为的级别。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the default value for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited"></xref>.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此字段创建一个新<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>，该值指示关联的组件不被继承。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Override to test for equality.
The object to test.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is the same; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>对象是否相同，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hashcode for this object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current inheritance level stored in this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性中存储的当前继承级别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"></xref> stored in this attribute.
Specifies that the component is inherited.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此字段创建一个新<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>，指示该关联的组件被继承。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Specifies that the component is inherited and is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 指定的组件继承，并且是只读的。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is inherited and read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段创建一个新<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>，该值指示关联的组件是继承并且是只读的。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该属性的当前值是否为该属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该属性的当前值是默认设置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the component is not inherited.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此字段创建一个新<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>，该值指示关联的组件不被继承。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Converts this attribute to a string.
trans-unit.target: 将此属性转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>.
